Happiness Month

So let's be clear. It is not special. Every day is Happiness Day for all involved in lifecollege.org. 'Special Happiness Month' would be tautological - all is indeed as usual, i.e., not special. Yet, outside, we still find those who seek happiness not, and, therefore, do not find.

Our learning point: If one holds happiness as a central value in one's life, making it a shaper of destiny, do we need to seek it at all? Should it not always be present? We are our values.

To make Happiness Month all it can be, we know one's values need to be 'sharpened' throughout life, to be revisited regularly, ensuring such values are central to and alive in one's life. Always part of one's destiny, constantly enlivened, sought & always held. Central Values are as one: one's true self, and one's real life. Our Happiness Programme flows through 21 Happiness Activities with you.

So as a Central Value, with lifecollege.org, let us re-aliven happiness through Happiness Month - November, 2021...

Leadership Excellence

Our 'Excellence in Leadership' programmes cover the development of confidence and courage, how to realise self-leadership potential and increase personal and organisational creativity. By keeping your senior people free to think, through excellence in goal setting, project leadership, time management, developing others, delegation, applying leadership to all management situations, you will return many-fold what you invest, year after year after year.

'When the best rulers achieve their purpose, their subjects claim the achievement as their own.' - Lao Tzu

Read More
